title: Preparing for a Week-Long Hiking and Camping Adventure in Patagonia
theme: Planning a safe and memorable outdoor trip in one of the world’s most breathtaking landscapes
subtopics: Best seasons to visit and how weather impacts trails
Selecting multi-day trekking routes suited to skill level
Packing essential hiking, camping, and cooking gear
Physical training and conditioning before departure
Navigation tools and offline map preparation
Balancing strenuous hikes with rest and recovery days
